
How to run ?
./parallel_bubble N P

Note: Please dont include process more than 5 . As its causing hardware issues.

ex:
ex:raviteja@RAVIs-MBP Downloads % ./xyz 100 5
701 429 681 978 315 406 699 939 440 234 116 541 394 684 791 441 686 462 719 900 248 220 818 992 699 885 771 293 993 59 504 695 488 538 25 155 296 76 94 736 310 562 629 56 247 421 497 933 235 217 185 836 789 355 180 488 240 951 133 586 362 990 281 202 528 658 358 824 734 804 912 45 367 893 101 966 666 599 251 254 168 789 90 957 144 270 445 385 574 930 323 936 920 956 139 448 614 849 624 348
